Sentencas: Ceramic electrochemical devices, such as solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), require a high electrochemical reaction density.
Titulo: Fabrication process for micropatterned ceramics via UV-nanoimprint lithography using UV-curable binder

Sentencas: UV-nanoimprint lithography (UV-NIL) process comprising ceramic particles and a UV-curable resin as the binder was proposed to fabricate a high-aspect-patterned ceramic for SOFC.
Titulo: Fabrication process for micropatterned ceramics via UV-nanoimprint lithography using UV-curable binder

Sentencas: The proposed method was used to mold ceramic slurry with UV-curable binder that can cure with electrochemically-optimized ceramic particles.
Titulo: Fabrication process for micropatterned ceramics via UV-nanoimprint lithography using UV-curable binder

Sentencas: Last, the UV-cured ceramic was sintered, whereupon ceramic micropatterns were obtained on a ceramic substrate.
Titulo: Fabrication process for micropatterned ceramics via UV-nanoimprint lithography using UV-curable binder

Sentencas: The study chose a UV monomer and photo-initiator that would not contaminate SOFC material.
Titulo: Fabrication process for micropatterned ceramics via UV-nanoimprint lithography using UV-curable binder

Sentencas: The appropriate ratio of the monomer to the photo-initiator were investigated to conduct UV-NIL despite containing high ceramic concentration which absorbs UV wave length.
Titulo: Fabrication process for micropatterned ceramics via UV-nanoimprint lithography using UV-curable binder

Sentencas: The ratio of UV-curable resin to ceramic particles that resulted in minimal cracks during sintering process was found.
Titulo: Fabrication process for micropatterned ceramics via UV-nanoimprint lithography using UV-curable binder

Sentencas: Finally, the fabrication of ceramic pillar patterns was demonstrated.
Titulo: Fabrication process for micropatterned ceramics via UV-nanoimprint lithography using UV-curable binder
Fabrication process for micropatterned ceramics via UV-nanoimprint lithography using UV-curable binder

Sentencas: The Japan Society of Applied Physics
Titulo: Fabrication process for micropatterned ceramics via UV-nanoimprint lithography using UV-curable binder
